message: I started a group called Founders-Tax with the idea of chatting with other founders about tax efficient startup advice....like everywhere else the brain dead startup founders had no value to add.....(I don’t get why people try so hard to fill the buck but ignore the leaks but its synonymous with the whole industry) but my comment is although I was able to delete all of the topics out of the group...there seems t be no way to delete the group. Please advise.
Or make your group as 'Private' until the Convore staff reply you with the solution
@deancollins I think there is only way is leaving the group.Group actions-->leave this group
